name: get_uniqe_values_from_column
description: Returns the unique values from a column in a table if the column contains 20 or fewer unique values. If there are more than 20 unique values from a column in a table, the function returns the number of unique values. Use this function when to determin if a WHERE clause in a SQL query requries a '=' or 'ILIKE' operator. Only use tables and columns that appear in the database description or in the table description. Do not assume the existance of any columns or tables.
